name: Kalighat (Kolkata)
short: One of the well-known Shakti Peethas — associated with the toe of Sati in some traditions.
long: Kalighat Kali Temple in Kolkata is a major Shakti Peetha. It is associated with Maa Kali and has deep cultural and historical importance in Bengal. Fill this with more historical and pilgrimage information.

name: Kamakhya (Guwahati)
short: An important tantric Shakti Peetha located on Nilachal Hill.
long: Kamakhya is famed for its tantric traditions and the annual Ambubachi Mela. The temple is devoted to the Goddess and is a major pilgrimage site.

name: Kanyakumari (Cape Comorin)
short: Southernmost Shakti Peetha — world-famous pilgrimage spot.
long: Kanyakumari is the place where the body part of the Goddess is said to have fallen in some accounts. It is also a famous tourist location with the Vivekananda Rock Memorial nearby.
